664: In addition, under Coverage F we will pay up to $15 per day, to a maximum of $450, for transportation expenses incurred by you. This applies only in the event of the total theft of "your covered auto". We will pay only transportation expenses incurred during the period: 1. Beginning 48 hours after the theft; and 2. Ending when "your covered auto" is returned to use or when we pay or offer to pay for its loss.
